name: Zombie Puzzle: Save the Chicks. Zombie Catchers!
name_original: Zombie Puzzle: Save the Chicks. Zombie Catchers!
description:
Zombies have stolen chickens and hid them in a cage on a zombie farm. The last hope - brave zombie catchers! Clear the levels from zombies and save the chickens.

FUN PUZZLES
First levels that can be completed in a few moves but the further you go, the more difficult the levels get. If you want to train your brain and relax at the same time - this game for you!

ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY
- Simple navigation using swipes;
- Are you stuck? Use the restart button to start over;
- There is no time limit, so no rush. Think one step ahead before every swipe;
- All levels are handmade;
- This free and offline puzzle game includes dozens of levels.
- More challenging levels soon!

PLAY OFFLINE
No Wi-Fi? No problem! Play the game anytime without an internet connection.

We'd love to get your feedback about our puzzle game. To let us know about any problems & suggestions, feel free to send us an email at support@playrea.com.

Are you up for the Zombie Puzzle challenge? Download and join the ranks of zombie catchers!
